item.title: What to do?
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:13, topic:388244”][quote author=Rash link=topic=484069.msg3546598#msg3546598 date=1301228700]

Get 99 fletching, cooking and mage. Those are the basic 99’s everyone should have, and there really cheep right now (: I think you profit about 15 coins per 58 xp for fletching right now, so you would make like 5m getting 99 in that, and that would almost cover 99 cooking using shark. Gl mate <3

Most people stop at 94 mage, and I only have 1 of those that you mentioned which is ofcourse mage.

I want as many 99’s aspossible, so yeah
[/quote]

If you enjoy slay, Maybe do attack? 99Attack = 99 hitpoints too.

I did 88-99 defense with slayer.[/quote]

Im looking at non combat skills at the moment.

[quote=“krackkid, post:16, topic:388244”]Oh Rash that post .

But I think you could try doing this: http://www.zybez.net/guides/502/fletching/#train[/quote]
(Y)

Read full topic

item.title: What to do?
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:14, topic:388244”][quote author=Rash link=topic=484069.msg3546512#msg3546512 date=1301220579]

Get 99 fletching, cooking and mage. Those are the basic 99’s everyone should have, and there really cheep right now (: I think you profit about 15 coins per 58 xp for fletching right now, so you would make like 5m getting 99 in that, and that would almost cover 99 cooking using shark. Gl mate <3

Is that buying the logs, and bowstrings?

Thanks<3
[/quote]
Thats buying maple logs and fletching them to unstrungs and selling them, do NOT string them or you will lose like 50 coins each.[/quote]

Fastest way to 99?

Read full topic
